long_description: Big and bold, the Spy Discord Polarized Sunglasses for men let you make whatever statement you want on the beach or out on the town, any time of year. Polycarbonate lenses are highly impact resistant; polarization cuts glare from water, snow, roads and metal surfaces. Gray polarized lenses block 87% of visible light and 100% of harmful UV rays. Frames are made of tough nylon.
short_description: Big and bold, the Spy Discord Polarized Sunglasses for men let you make whatever statement you want on the beach or out on the town, any time of year.
